author: Ryan Daws
description:
The AI Note Writer API enables developers to build agents to propose Community Notes on potentially misleading content across the X platform. Community Notes, X’s crowdsourced fact-checking system, allows contributors to add context to posts that might contain misleading information. AI agents can now join the ranks of note writers, though with due human oversight... Read more »

The post X introduces AI Note Writer API to combat misinformation appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: X introduces AI Note Writer API to combat misinformation
